title: Dead by Daylight | All-Kill | Official Trailer
author: Dead by Daylight
description:
A famous singer hides a twisted double life. Good thing The Entity loves a show.

The new killer is Ji-Woon Hak, better known to fans across the globe as The Trickster. Famed singer by day, calculating serial killer by night, The Trickster thirsts for notoriety, treating both his music and his murders as high art. The new Survivor is Yun-Jin Lee, a resilient and ambitious music producer who built her reputation on the success of her one and only client – The Trickster. Ignoring his true nature in favor of her career, Yun-Jin now stands to pay the ultimate price for her ambition.  

 The ALL-KILL Chapter is available now in Dead by Daylight.   

Learn more about the Chapter: https://bit.ly/3qTs5tm

Dead by Daylight is a multiplayer action/horror game where one player takes on the role of a brutal Killer and the other four play as Survivors. As a Killer, your goal is to sacrifice as many Survivors as possible. As Survivors, your goal is to work together to evade, escape and most importantly – stay alive.   

BUY GAME: https://buythegame.deadbydaylight.com/

Join the official forum: https://forum.deadbydaylight.com    

Like and follow us on our official Social Media Channels:   

- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DeadByDaylight    
- Twitter: https://twitter.com/deadbybhvr    
- Instagram: https://instagram.com/deadbydaylight

Music by Michel F. April

 #DbD #AllKill

localize.description:
一个著名的歌手隐藏着扭曲的双重生活。好在《实体》爱看戏。

新的杀手是白智文，全球粉丝更熟悉的 "诡计多端"。白天是著名的歌手，晚上是诡计多端的连环杀手，诡计多端渴求名声，把他的音乐和他的谋杀都当作是高级艺术。新的幸存者是李云珍，她是一个坚韧不拔、野心勃勃的音乐制作人，她的名声建立在她唯一的客户--诡计师的成功之上。为了自己的事业而无视他的真面目，李允珍现在要为自己的野心付出终极代价。  

 ALL-KILL章节现已在Dead by Daylight上架。   

了解更多关于本章的内容：https://bit.ly/3qTs5tm

白天死亡》是一款多人动作/恐怖游戏，其中一名玩家扮演一名残忍的杀手，其他四人扮演幸存者。作为杀手，你的目标是牺牲尽可能多的幸存者。作为幸存者，你的目标是一起合作，以逃避，逃生和最重要的 - 保持活着。   

购买游戏：https://buythegame.deadbydaylight.com/

加入官方论坛：https://forum.deadbydaylight.com    

请在我们的官方社交媒体渠道上关注我们。   

- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DeadByDaylight    
- Twitter: https://twitter.com/deadbybhvr    
- Instagram: https://instagram.com/deadbydaylight

音乐：Michel F. April

 #DbD #AllKill
localize.title: 光天化日｜全杀戮｜官方预告片

localize.description:
一個著名的歌手隱藏着扭曲的雙重生活。好在《實體》愛看戲。

新的殺手是白智文，全球粉絲更熟悉的 "詭計多端"。白天是著名的歌手，晚上是詭計多端的連環殺手，詭計多端渴求名聲，把他的音樂和他的謀殺都當作是高級藝術。新的倖存者是李雲珍，她是一個堅韌不拔、野心勃勃的音樂製作人，她的名聲建立在她唯一的客戶--詭計師的成功之上。爲了自己的事業而無視他的真面目，李允珍現在要爲自己的野心付出終極代價。  

 ALL-KILL章節現已在Dead by Daylight上架。   

瞭解更多關於本章的內容：https://bit.ly/3qTs5tm

白天死亡》是一款多人動作/恐怖遊戲，其中一名玩家扮演一名殘忍的殺手，其他四人扮演倖存者。作爲殺手，你的目標是犧牲儘可能多的倖存者。作爲倖存者，你的目標是一起合作，以逃避，逃生和最重要的 - 保持活着。   

購買遊戲：https://buythegame.deadbydaylight.com/

加入官方論壇：https://forum.deadbydaylight.com    

請在我們的官方社交媒體渠道上關注我們。   

- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DeadByDaylight    
- Twitter: https://twitter.com/deadbybhvr    
- Instagram: https://instagram.com/deadbydaylight

音樂：Michel F. April
